text: 60 Minutes is a CBS television news program, which began in 1968. The program was created by Don Hewitt. In February 2009, TV Guide named 60 Minutes 6th on TV Guide's 50 Greatest TV Shows of All Time. == References == Category:1968 television series debuts Category:1960s American television series Category:1970s American television series Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: 60 Minutes
